message.translation: The Smart Setup Wizard can detect the type of Internet connection that you have.
message.variable: The Smart Setup Wizard can detect the type of Internet connection that you have.

message.translation: Do you want the Smart Setup Wizard to try and detect the connection type now?
message.variable: Do you want the Smart Setup Wizard to try and detect the connection type now?

message.translation: No. I want to configure the router myself.
message.variable: No. I want to configure the router myself.

message.translation: - Provjerite jesu li kabelske veze ispravne. Upute potražite u priručniku za instalaciju usmjerivača.
message.variable: - Check that the cable connections are correct. Refer to the router Installation Guide for instructions.

message.translation: - Provjerite je li napajanje širokopojasnog modema ispravno isključeno i ponovo uključeno. Ako vaš modem ima rezervno baterijsko napajanje, izvadite i ponovo umetnite bateriju kako biste isključili i ponovo uključili napajanje modema.
message.variable: - Check that your broadband modem is power cycled correctly. If you have a battery-backed modem, remove and reinsert the battery to power cycle your modem.

message.translation: ”1. Napajanje modema nije isključeno i uključeno tijekom postupka kabliranja.”;
message.variable: 1. The modem was not power cycled during the cabling step.

message.translation: 2. Žuti Ethernet kabel nije do kraja umetnut ili nije umetnut u ispravan priključak.
message.variable: 2. The yellow Ethernet cable is not fully inserted, or is inserted in the wrong place.

message.translation: MAC adresa je jedinstven broj. MAC adresu računala ili usmjerivača možete pronaći na oznaci proizvoda.
message.variable: A MAC address is a unique number. You can find the MAC address of the computer or router on its product label.

message.translation: Nakon što provjerite Ethernet kabel, pritisnite Pokušaj ponovo.
message.variable: After you have checked the Ethernet cable, click Try again.

message.translation: Pronađite datoteku sigurnosne kopije postavki usmjerivača koju ste ranije spremili i za nastavak pritisnite Sljedeće.
message.variable: Browse to the router settings backup file you previously saved, and click Next to proceed.
Checking the Internet connection; please wait …

message.translation: U tijeku je prepoznavanje internetske veze
Je li vam vaš davatelj internetskih usluga (ISP) dodijelio fiksnu (statičku) IP adresu? To je vrlo rijetka posebna primjena.
message.variable: Did your Internet Service Provider (ISP) assign to you a fixed (static) IP address? This is a very rare special deployment.

message.translation: Želite li da vam značajka NETGEAR Genie pomogne?
message.variable: Do you want NETGEAR Genie to help?

message.translation: Želite li da značajka NETGEAR Genie pokuša ponovo?
message.variable: Do you want NETGEAR Genie to try again?

message.translation: Unesite fiksne IP postavke koje vam je dodijelio vaš davatelj internetskih usluga i za nastavak pritisnite Sljedeće.
message.variable: Enter the fixed IP settings assigned by your Internet Service Provider and click Next to proceed.
I corrected a problem with the Ethernet cable.

message.translation: Spremio sam postavke usmjerivača u datoteku i želim usmjerivač ponovo postaviti na te vrijednosti.
message.variable: I have saved the router settings in a file and I want to restore the router to those settings.

message.translation: Isključio sam i uključio napajanje modema, nakon čega sam pričekao 2 minute.
message.variable: I just power cycled the modem and waited for 2 minutes.
I want to configure the Internet connection myself

message.translation: Ako ste se ranije povezali s internetskom uslugom putem računala ili drugog usmjerivača, značajka NETGEAR Genie može koristiti istu MAC koja je ranije radila.
message.variable: If you previously connected to your Internet service with a computer or another router, NETGEAR Genie can use the same MAC address that worked before.

message.translation: Neispravno ISP korisničko ime ili lozinka
message.variable: Incorrect ISP User name or Password

message.translation: Provjerite je li kabel ispravno priključen i na priključak širokopojasnog modema i na internetski priključak usmjerivača.
message.variable: Make sure that the cable is securely plugged into both the broadband modem port and the router Internet port.

message.translation: Na internetski priključak usmjerivača nije priključen Ethernet kabel.
message.variable: No Ethernet Cable Is Plugged into the Router Internet Port

message.translation: Ne, od svog davatelja internetskih usluga nisam dobio fiksnu (statičku) IP adresu.
message.variable: No, I did not get a fixed (static) IP address from my ISP.

message.translation: Ne, sam ću konfigurirati internetsku vezu.
message.variable: No, I want to configure the Internet connection myself.

message.translation: Pronađena je PPPoE DSL internetska veza
Došlo je do problema prilikom prepoznavanja internetske veze - IP adresa
message.variable: Problem Detecting the Internet Connection - IP Address

message.translation: Došlo je do problema prilikom prepoznavanja internetske veze - MAC adresa
message.variable: Problem Detecting the Internet Connection - MAC Address

message.translation: Došlo je do problema prilikom prepoznavanja internetske veze
Za nastavak odaberite opciju i pritisnite Sljedeće.
message.variable: Select an option and click Next to proceed.

message.translation: Usmjerivač se ne može povezati s Internetom pomoću trenutnih postavki.
message.variable: The router cannot connect to the Internet with the current settings.

message.translation: Razlog je vjerojatno nešto od sljedećeg:
message.variable: This is most likely due to one of the following reasons:

message.translation: Postupak može potrajati nekoliko minuta; pričekajte...
message.variable: This process can take a few minutes; please wait …

message.translation: Ovaj postupak može potrajati minutu ili dvije; pričekajte...
message.variable: This process can take a minute or two; please wait...

message.translation: Na ovom usmjerivaču unaprijed je postavljen sljedeći jedinstveni naziv bežične mreže (SSID) i
message.variable: This router is preset with the following unique wireless network name (SSID) and

message.translation: Ovaj zaslon automatski će se za nekoliko sekundi vratiti na prethodni zaslon...
message.variable: This screen will automatically return to the previous screen in a few seconds...

message.translation: Kako bi se izbjegla neusklađenost s davateljem internetskih usluga, IP adresa vašeg usmjerivača ažurirana je na
message.variable: To avoid a conflict with your Internet Service Provider, your router's IP address has been updated to

message.translation: ”Kako biste riješili ovaj problem, provjerite je li žuti Ethernet kabel ispravno umetnut i priključak širokopojasnog modema i internetski priključak na usmjerivaču.”;
message.variable: To solve this problem, make sure that the yellow Ethernet cable is securely plugged in to the broadband modem port and the router Internet port.

To solve this problem, power cycle the modem (turn it off and on). To power cycle a modem with battery backup, you might need to remove and reinsert its battery. After the power cycle, wait 2 minutes for the modem to completely start up.

message.translation: Da. Moj ISP dodijelio mi je fiksnu (statičku) IP adresu.
message.variable: Yes. My ISP assigned a fixed (static) IP address to me.
You are not yet connected to the Internet.

message.translation: Uspješno ste uspostavili vezu s Internetom.
message.variable: You are successfully connected to the Internet.

message.translation: Na vašem usmjerivaču unaprijed je postavljena WPA2-PSK bežična zaštita koja vas štiti od neovlaštenog pristupa. Za pristup mreži morate unijeti mrežni ključ (lozinku). Unaprijed određene postavke jedinstvene su za ovaj uređaj, poput serijskog broja. Ako ih želite promijeniti, to možete učiniti kasnije na zaslonu Postavke bežične mreže u web korisničkom sučelju usmjerivača.
message.variable: Your router is preset with WPA2-PSK wireless security to protect your network from unwanted access. To join the wireless network, you must enter the network key (password). These preset settings are unique to this device, like a serial number. If you want to change them, you can do so later in the Wireless Settings screen on the router web GUI.

message.translation: Zaštita bežične mreže nije omogućena na ovom usmjerivaču. NETGEAR vam preporučuje
message.variable: Wireless security is not enabled on this router. NETGEAR highly recommends that you

message.translation: kako biste omogućili zaštitu bežične mreže i na taj način osigurali sigurnost mreže.
message.variable: to enable wireless security and protect your network.

message.translation: Aplikacija Genie. Osobna upravljačka ploča koja omogućava nadziranje, kontrolu i popravak kućne mreže.
message.variable: Genie app. A personal dashboard that lets you monitor, control, and repair your home network.

message.translation: Aplikacija ReadySHARE Vault (samo za računala s operacijskim sustavom Windows). Omogućava automatsko kontinuirano sigurnosno kopiranje podataka s računala s operacijskim sustavom Windows na USB pogon koji je povezan s vašim usmjerivačem.
message.variable: ReadySHARE Vault app (Only for Windows computers). Enables automatic continuous backup of a Windows computer to a USB drive that’s connected to your router.

message.translation: Nakon dovršetka preuzimanja instaliraj aplikaciju Genie.
message.variable: Install the Genie app after the download completes.

message.translation: Kako biste dovršili konfiguriranje usmjerivača, nakon instalacije aplikacije Genie pritisnite gumb Sljedeće.
message.variable: Click the Next button after you install the Genie app to finish configuring the router.

message.translation: Nakon dovršetka preuzimanja instaliraj aplikaciju ReadySHARE Vault.
message.variable: Install the ReadySHARE Vault app after the download completes.

message.translation: Kako biste dovršili konfiguriranje usmjerivača, nakon instalacije aplikacije ReadySHARE Vault pritisnite gumb Sljedeće.
message.variable: Click the Next button after you Install the ReadySHARE Vault app to finish configuring the router.

message.translation: Install the Genie app and ReadySHARE Vault app after the download completes.
message.variable: Install the Genie app and ReadySHARE Vault app after the download completes.

message.translation: Click the Next button after you install the Genie app and ReadySHARE Vault app to finish configuring the router.
message.variable: Click the Next button after you install the Genie app and ReadySHARE Vault app to finish configuring the router.
After the installation, please click Next.

minutes for firmware upgrade.

minutes for firmware upgrade.

message.translation: The router is downloading the new version now. Please wait...
message.variable: The Router is downloading the new version now. Please wait...

message.translation: A new version has been found. Do You want to upgrade to the new version now?
message.variable: A new version has been found. Do You want to upgrade to the new version now?

message.translation: Ovaj postupak može potrajati minutu ili dvije; pričekajte...
message.variable: This process can take a minute or two; please wait...

message.translation: Provjeravaju se postavke vaše mreže, pričekajte…
Na vašoj mreži prepoznat je postojeći usmjerivač ili pristupnik
message.variable: An existing router or gateway is detected in your network

message.translation: Vaš NETGEAR usmjerivač povezan je s mrežom na kojoj već postoji drugi usmjerivač. Ako želite napustiti prvi priključeni usmjerivač, genie preporuča da za NETGEAR usmjerivač koristite način rada pristupne točke. Kada NETGEAR usmjerivač koristi način rada pristupne točke možete ga koristiti za pridruživanje mreži, a drugi usmjerivač može nastaviti izvršavati mrežne zadatke koje je ranije izvršavao.
message.variable: Your NETGEAR router is connected to a network that already has another router. If you want to leave the first router connected, genie recommends using Access Point mode for the NETGEAR router. When the NETGEAR router is in Access Point mode, you can use it to join the network and the other router continues to perform the same network tasks as before.

message.translation: Želite li ovaj uređaj postaviti na način rada pristupne točke
message.variable: Do you want to setup this device in Access Point mode

message.translation: Ne, želim ga pokrenuti u zadanom načinu rada kao usmjerivač
message.variable: No, I would like to run it in default mode as a router

message.translation: Dodavanje ovog usmjerivača u mrežu u načinu rada s pristupnom točkom
message.variable: To add this router to your network in Access Point Mode
IP Address of this new device

message.translation: Dinamički dohvati IP adresu s postojećeg usmjerivača
message.variable: Get IP Address dynamically from existing router

message.translation: Koristi fiksnu IP adresu (ne preporučuje se)

Napomena: Kada pritisnete Sljedeće, ovom usmjerivaču dodijelit će se nova IP adresa. U tom trenutku vaš preglednik mogao bi izgubiti vezu s mrežom. Kako biste ponovo uspostavili vezu s usmjerivačem, zatvorite prozor i ponovo pokrenite preglednik.
message.variable: Note: After you click Next, this router will be assigned a new IP address. When it happens your browser might be disconnected from the network. To reconnect to the router, close the window and launch your browser again.
Your NETGEAR router is connected to a network that already has another router.This means that you must select an operation mode:

Router mode gives you two different networks:The existing network from the original router,and another network form your new NETGEAR router.If all of your devices connect to NETGEAR router,recommend to use Router Mode.

This mode keeps the existing network from the original router only.Not all of the NETGEAR router's features are available in Access Point mode.If you have devices connect to both existing router and NETGEAR router,recommend to use Access Point Mode.

Your router is about to setup to Access Point Mode.You may experience short network interruption due to your router and client will need to obtain new IP address from your existing Router.If you lost network connection,you may manually connect to router again by visiting www.routerlogin.net.
The following router features are not available if you choose Access Point mode:
